title: Differentiable SLAM Helps Deep Learning-based LiDAR Perception Tasks
excerpt: We design a SLAM Loss to train LiDAR based models.
citation: Prashant Kumar, Dheeraj Vattikonda, Vedang Bhupesh Shenvi Nadkarni, Erqun Dong, and Sabyasachi Sahoo, “Differentiable SLAM helps deep learning-based lidar perception tasks,” in 34th British Machine Vision Conference (BMVC), Aberdeen, UK, BMVA Press, 2023, p. 822

title: GLiDR: Topologically Regularized Graph Generative Network for Sparse LiDAR Point Clouds
excerpt: We propose GliDR, a graph generative network regularized by 0-dimensional Persistent Homolgy to densify globally consistent static LiDAR pointclouds.
citation: Prashant Kumar, Kshitij M Bhat, Vedang Bhupesh Shenvi Nadkarni and Prem Kalra, 2024 IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), Seattle, WA, USA, 2024, pp. 15152-15161
